channel.title: Question on clients
channel.description: Is it possible to make the client i currently have in HD? like replace the cache or something and get better textures?

item.title: Question on clients
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

[quote=“cal01, post:2, topic:331310”]You mean HD like this webclient?

www.serverwebclient.tk[/quote]
someone ban this member… his link is a virus…

[quote=“badger41, post:3, topic:331310”]if you are talking about making the 317 load 508 data, not without drastic edits to your client.

you would have to convert the models to the old model header, convert the emotes and make it so they dont crash the client, along with other things.[/quote]
How do I do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Question on clients
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

if you are talking about making the 317 load 508 data, not without drastic edits to your client.

you would have to convert the models to the old model header, convert the emotes and make it so they dont crash the client, along with other things.

Read full topic
